trans-unit.source: Default window procedure for Desktop Window Manager (DWM) hit testing within the non-client area

target.mrk: Default window procedure for Desktop Window Manager (DWM) hit testing within the non-client area

trans-unit.source: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.

seg-source.mrk: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.

target.mrk: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.

trans-unit.source: Additional message-specific information. The content of this parameter depends on the message.

seg-source.mrk: The content of this parameter depends on the message.

target.mrk: The content of this parameter depends on the message.

trans-unit.source: The result of the hit test.

seg-source.mrk: The result of the hit test.

target.mrk: The result of the hit test.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: When creating custom frames that include the standard caption buttons, WM_NCHITTEST and other non-client hit test messages should first be passed to _WinAPI_DwmDefWindowProc().

seg-source.mrk: When creating custom frames that include the standard caption buttons, WM_NCHITTEST and other non-client hit test messages should first be passed to _WinAPI_DwmDefWindowProc().

target.mrk: When creating custom frames that include the standard caption buttons, WM_NCHITTEST and other non-client hit test messages should first be passed to _WinAPI_DwmDefWindowProc().

trans-unit.source: This enables the DWM to provide hit testing for the captions buttons.

seg-source.mrk: This enables the DWM to provide hit testing for the captions buttons.

target.mrk: This enables the DWM to provide hit testing for the captions buttons.

trans-unit.source: If _WinAPI_DwmDefWindowProc() does not handle the non-client hit test messages, further processing of these messages might be neccessary.

seg-source.mrk: If _WinAPI_DwmDefWindowProc() does not handle the non-client hit test messages, further processing of these messages might be neccessary.

target.mrk: If _WinAPI_DwmDefWindowProc() does not handle the non-client hit test messages, further processing of these messages might be neccessary.

trans-unit.source: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.
